subject: Re: Axiom - Progress Update
preview: @joel Awesome effort!! Thanks so much!! Sure, I have uploaded the logo to this note.

full_threads.body:
@joel Awesome effort!! Thanks so much!!

Sure, I have uploaded the logo to this note.

@heath I've finished checking and fix the other stuff and I have updated the other request. Can you help me access the logo for this one? 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1y3QUUXnHiM7sLjD1Z45ADyS1zrmgE4Se/view?usp=sharing
@joel The staging-axiom seems to have reverted? Can you please check... hopefully we have a backup? Thanks

Hi Heath

I am trying to go through the staging website, but it is showing the old website and also some 404 errors on some pages. Can you please have look and let me know what is happening?

Thanks.
Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

> Sarah-Jane got back to me with some of the videos she wants to display on Video listing page. Please see her message (In red) below with links to each of the videos:
>
> Videos - Can you please provide us with links to all video that will need to be displayed in the listing as well as the category/filter they need to appear under:
> I’m not sure if you require the mp4 files or the vimeo links but if it is the links you require then:
> Coleman Greig: https://vimeo.com/323985056 <https://vimeo.com/323985056> (Legal)
> Nutrimetics: https://vimeo.com/323978903 <https://vimeo.com/323978903> (Consumer goods)

> Axiom video so far is out of date and has to be re-done
> Filter categories - Please can you provide us with a list of the category filters that needs to be used for the video listing? I don’t think we have enough videos to turn on the filters yet
> Kind Regards,
